Title: MultiMenu ASP.NET Cascading Menu WebControl
Description: MultiMenu is an N-level cascading menu WebControl written on the .NET 2.0/3.5 BCL.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
MultiMenu is an N-level cascading menu WebControl written on the .NET 2.0/3.5 BCL.

MultiMenu is an extremely robust server control with the following features:
  • Horizontal, vertical, and context display modes
  • Full keyboard support
  • Works with Netscape 6.0 (and greater), Internet Explorer 5.5 (and greater), Safari, FireFox 1.0 (and greater), and JAWS
  • 508 Compliant
  • XML configurable
  • CSS stylesheet driven
  • Full Design Time Support
Full source code is available along with serveral examples covering all features of the menu.
